system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision fontable, implementation interface." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "font, name, property" date: "$Date: 2009-06-10 21:44:06 -0700 (Wed, 10 Jun 2009) $" revision: "$Revision: 79201 $"
deferred class ../implementation_interface/ev_fontable_i.xmlEV_FONTABLE_I
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_fontable_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
feature -- Access
f_font../implementation_interface/ev_fontable_i.xml#f_fontfont: ../interface/ev_font.xmlEV_FONT -- Typeface appearance for Current. deferred ensure not_void: Result /= Void end
feature -- Element change
f_set_font../implementation_interface/ev_fontable_i.xml#f_set_fontset_font (a_font: ../interface/ev_font.xmlEV_FONT) -- Assign a_font to ../implementation_interface/ev_fontable_i.xml#f_fontfont. require a_font_not_void: a_font /= Void deferred ensure assigned: ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_is_usableis_usable implies ../implementation_interface/ev_fontable_i.xml#f_fontfont.../interface/ev_font.xml#f_is_equalis_equal (a_font) end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_interface/ev_fontable_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_fontable.xmlEV_FONTABLE note option: stable attribute end
